name: 2248 Chip Connect
description:
2248 Chip Connect is a addictive chips puzzle and 2248 connect number game.

It's simple logic game to train your mind and make it sharp.It will be the most beautiful, learn-able, and user-friendly merge number puzzle game you’ve ever played.

Easy to play, and pleasurable puzzle game.
If you play smart and think ahead, you can win the highest score.

How To Play :
1. Connect three game chips(or more) with the same number next to each other to merge them, horizontally, vertically, or both.
2. Merge game Chips to get higher number chips.
3. Try to merge 2 and 2 and 4 to 8, use different 2248 merge way

Merge numbers, link the number chips, make higher score to 2248 even higher.
